qas.question: How many people attended Broadway shows during the 2013-2014 season?
What is the nickname of the Times Square Theater District?
What was the dollar amount of the tickets sold on Broadway in 2013-14?
What was the percentage increase in the Broadway ticket revenue from 2012-3 to 2013-4?
How many people attended a Broadway show in the 2013-4 season?
In 2012-3, what number of people saw a show on Broadway?

context: Forty of the city's theaters, with more than 500 seats each, are collectively known as Broadway, after the major thoroughfare that crosses the Times Square Theater District, sometimes referred to as "<a1_0>The Great White Way<a1_0/>". According to The Broadway League, Broadway shows sold approximately <a2_0>US$1.27 billion<a2_0/> worth of tickets in the 2013–2014 season, an <a3_0>11.4%<a3_0/> increase from US$1.139 billion in the 2012–2013 season. Attendance in 2013–2014 stood at <a0_0><a4_0>12.21 million<a4_0/><a0_0/>, representing a 5.5% increase from the 2012–2013 season's <a5_0>11.57 million<a5_0/>.
